95 Code for America Summit 2025 🧑‍💻🇺🇸

May 23, 2025

  • civictech
  • episode
  • government
  • summit
  • conference

We’re joined by Amanda Renteria, CEO of Code for America to discuss their upcoming Summit event. We’ll cover a bit about the event itself, the state of the civic tech ecosystem, and the impact that event could have on the space.
